about.about_me: I'm a Computer Science student specializing in full-stack development; Machine learning and Data Science enthousiaste. I build end-to-end applications—from intuitive front-end interfaces to robust back-end systems—while designing, training, and deploying machine learning pipelines on real-world data. Comfortable working across the full development cycle, I enjoy turning complex problems into scalable, data-driven solutions using modern frameworks and cloud technologies.
